original_title: India Pledges Continued Support for Sri Lanka’s Economic Recovery
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); In a sign of continued support, the Indian High Commissioner to Sri Lanka  Santosh Jha reiterated India's commitment to being a "steadfast partner" in the country's economic recovery during a recent meeting with the Governor of the Central Bank of Sri Lanka, Dr. Nandalal Weerasinghe.
The meeting focused on an "early launch" of the Unified Payments Interface (UPI) system in Sri Lanka.
The discussion also addressed the "growth in Indian Rupee trade settlements."
Notably, the High Commissioner pledged India's support in Sri Lanka's ongoing debt restructuring process.
